CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 31, 1956, pg. 1, reads: "Thousands Observe 'Prayer Day' Here! - Holy Communion - Father Walter pg. H. Parker, rector of Holy Cross Episcopal Church, held special Communion Services at 9:30 A. M., on 'Prayer Day,' with special prayers for the courageous Rev. Martin Luther King, and those associated with him, in Montgomery, Ala. bus boycott fight. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Father Walter P. H. Parker standing beside kneeling women and men at altar rail, for Prayer Day honoring Montgomery Alabama bus boycotters, in Holy Cross Episcopal Church
